spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

spells.name: Detect Poison
spells.description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

spells.name: Flare
spells.description: Dazzles one creature (–1 penalty on attack rolls).

spells.name: Guidance
spells.description: +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

spells.name: Mending
spells.description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

spells.name: Purify Food and Drink
spells.description: Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.

spells.name: Resistance
spells.description: Subject gains +1 bonus on saving throws.

spells.name: Stabilize
spells.description: Cause a dying creature to stabilize.
